title: Temptation
verses: 1 Corinthians 10:13 (WEB) — “No temptation has taken you except what is common to man… He will also make the way of escape, that you may be able to endure it.”
Hebrews 4:15–16 (WEB) — “We don’t have a high priest who can’t be touched with the feeling of our infirmities… Let’s therefore draw near with boldness to the throne of grace.”
James 1:14–15 (WEB) — “Each one is tempted when he is drawn away by his own lust… Then the lust, when it has conceived, bears sin.”
Romans 13:14 (WEB) — “Put on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make no provision for the flesh, for its lusts.”
body: Temptation is both common and conquerable in Christ. Expose the pattern: trigger, desire, lie, choice. Replace it with truth, prayer, and a practical escape route. Bring a trusted believer into the light with you.
prayer: Deliverer and High Priest, show me the escape You provide. Strengthen me to say no to sin and yes to righteousness. Surround me with wise help and holy habits. Amen.
